law.history: Repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 61, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998; amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. ch. 67, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 69, sec. 72, effective July 15, 1998. -- Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended as KRS 224.01-500, 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 499, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994. â€“ Amended and reenacted as KRS 154.12-202, 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 39, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 13, effective February 26, 1991.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Kentucky Recycling Brokerage Authority -- Powers -- Duties -- Brokerage fee -- Reports.
metadata.former-codification: 154.12-202, and also previously codified as KRS 152.045.
metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/98). Under KRS 446.260, the repeal of this section in 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 61 prevails over its amendment in 1998 Ky. Acts chs. 67 and 69.
